name: Corgi, Protecc!
description:
He atacc, he protecc, but most importantly he carries a gas-operated rotating bolt 7.62×39mm rifle to defend his owner from the catt.

Corgi protecc is an infinite wave based top-down shooter where you have to delay the cats from attacking your owner's house for as long as possible.

You'll have to choose wisely what you'll want to upgrade to survive to the next wave of enemies.

Use WASD to move, and mouse to aim and shoot.

Dogs With Guns's submission to the 72h Ludum Dare 50 Jam:

  • JuulH - juulh.itch.io
  • Dean Isseyegh - deaniss.itch.io
  • Loo - wakashi.itch.io
  • Kacper Garbacz - benk86.itch.io
